definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Walk the dog, brush your teeth, lay out clothing for the next day, and get into bed.
sentences.chinese: 溜，刷牙，準備妥當第二天的衣服後就去睏覺。

sentences.english: He rigged up all the electric wires rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 他把所有的電線迅速地安裝妥當。

sentences.english: With regard to theory of injury caused by medical treatment, it carries appropriateness.
sentences.chinese: 治療行爲傷害說具有妥當性。

sentences.english: I wake up early, things are done properly after the beginning craned Alice looked forward.
sentences.chinese: 我早早的起牀，事情做妥當後便開始伸長脖子翹盼來。

sentences.english: I will dispose the matter to your satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 這件事我一定會處理妥當，包你滿意。

sentences.english: Before class begins, one must come prepared, with neat attires and proper posture.
sentences.chinese: 上課之前準備妥當，衣冠端正，姿勢亦端。

sentences.english: Have all our travel arrangements been properly teed up?
sentences.chinese: 我們旅行的所有事項都安排妥當了嗎？

sentences.english: (Yes, this includes bedroom closets.) You want everything to be ticketyboo at work and at home.
sentences.chinese: 你希望工作和家裏的一切事物都妥妥當當。

sentences.english: If the grounding scheme were not proper, it would cause damage for OPGW.
sentences.chinese: 如果接地方式不妥當，會造成OPGW的損壞。

sentences.english: She changed her money before going abroad.
sentences.chinese: 出國前她已將錢兌換妥當。

sentences.english: Is imperfect contrition sufficient for a good Confession?
sentences.chinese: 爲妥當修和，下等痛悔也夠了麼？

sentences.english: They are ready and raring to go.
sentences.chinese: 他們已準備妥當急切想出發。

sentences.english: The Petitioner had made or will make proper financial provision for the Respondent.
sentences.chinese: 呈請人已經或將會爲答辯人提供妥當的經濟援助。

sentences.english: It would be as inappropriate as the farmer questioning the soil about its fruitfulness .
sentences.chinese: 正如農民對土地質疑其豐饒一般極不妥當。

sentences.english: Attach belaying device to your harness in the call zone.
sentences.chinese: 在預備區中將確保器安裝準備妥當。

sentences.english: He was not a very nice man in many ways.
sentences.chinese: 他的許多做法都有失妥當。

definition: to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
to take a lot of trouble (over sb or sth)/may I trouble you (to do sth)
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
